data.message: hey facebook you know what would be cool.... that you dont auto scroll my page while im reading something just because something higher on my news feed got a comment or 2.

replies.message: Hi Andrew. We're always looking for ways to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. If you have any ideas or suggestions for us, feel free to share them here: http://on.fb.me/1QnrM4J. Thanks! -Azaria

Thanks Facebook you use those three years most of my big good ideas but I don't see the effect for me,I know now that Mark Zuckerberg own me a lot but I don't see it I see the opposite we help people that made problems with malice if someone give my millions I'm looking to I want them go to jail I know there names some of them are from Bulgaria living in USA I can't believe after all I gave before 9 years those three there isn't a judge or God that could ignore did you know that they are stupidly -manipulative how is your translater!
